body:
Toby here, and im here to ask for some ideas on what can i do while im/you are temp-banned
on servers, yesterday i was temp-banned cuz of inappropriate language in chat, and the temp-ban's time
has been up, but i recently just found out i was temp-banned again for scamming players w/ the
infamous alt + f4 dirty trick.

This post isn't an appeal nor meant to flame the server's staff or anyone, ill be honest and i did
do this and legendaryengram took it upon himself to temp-ban me for 2 weeks (something like that
upto june 3), and i do not blame him for this since i've publicly tried this b4 alrdy on some ppl so
yeah 

(back to what i want to actually say for the title)

since im gonna be temp-banned for a week or so, i need your guys help in giving me ideas in
spending my time while im temporarily banned from Avicus, i already have pre-plans incase like
the usual

-Watch Youtube/Youtubers i like
-Watch TV/ Movies
-Go play outside or do some other activity
-Hangout on another server
- etc. etc.

ive got alot more but i/we need more ideas and maybe even more specific ideas like
"why not go watch this movie i think you'll like" or something along those lines
and just for safe measure, i will not be hopping on the server w/ an Alt just so i dont
want to have a higher risk of having both accounts perm-banned/ip-banned and im not sure if its actually
allowed but i wont try just incase that i wont walk into a minefield.

So this post is not just for me but for those other people who have limited ideas and thoughts on
what they can do besides appealing a ban or doing some house work/chores or attenting school/
homework, etc. etc.

Leave your suggestions, comments, and ideas down below, please no hate on me or to anyone in
the staff!

Leave your suggestions, comments, and ideas down below, please no hate on me or to anyone in
the staff!
title: Ideas on what to do when temp-banned?

replies.body: Play on other servers or do something outside.
replies.body_tagged: Play on other servers or do something outside.

replies.body: Ban evading is not allowed. I do not suggest you try that if you still want to play on Avicus.
replies.body_tagged: Ban evading is not allowed. I do not suggest you try that if you still want to play on Avicus.

replies.body:
Tbh why do you break rules?

Make a resource pack, encourages creativity and still has something to do with the game. Plus, you'll get a custom look and exactly to your liking.

replies.body: It doesn't matter if an infraction is old or new, that won't affect your chances of getting the trial at all, however, if you have a lot of infractions related to immaturity, etc, then that might change the senior's point of view about you. But.. that's not the case here cause you have some good roots with the community :')
